news.title: Instagram will alert parents if their kids ‘repeatedly’ search for self-harm topics
news.summary: Starting next week, Instagram will notify parents to check on their teen searching for terms related to self-harm or suicide. news.title: Google takes control of ‘Android of robotics’ project in quest for physical AI
news.summary: Google is folding Alphabet's AI robotics "moonshot," Intrinsic, into the company after five years as an independent unit. news.title: New York sues Valve, alleging its loot boxes are ‘quintessential gambling’
news.summary: New York Attorney General Letitia James is suing Valve for "illegally promoting gambling" through the loot box systems it has built for video games like Counter-Strike 2, Team Fortress 2, and Dota 2, according to a press release. news.title: Show HN: Terminal Phone – E2EE Walkie Talkie from the Command Line
news.summary: TerminalPhone is a single, self-contained Bash script that provides anonymous, end-to-end encrypted voice and text communication between two parties over the Tor network. It operates as a walkie-talkie: you record a voice message, and it is compressed, encrypted, and transmitted to the remote party
